title: Where the rune pages at ?!
body: I can't find rune pages in the store anywhere, I don't know if I'm going insane and not noticing them or if they're actually not on the store. Rito pls.

replies.body:
Be sure your sorting parameters on the left side of the store all say *show all*. This should reveal rune pages for you.

Let me know if you have any further questions. ^.^
